tool_description: Validates logical consistency and relationships within taxonomy structures to identify structural issues.

taxonomy_id.description: Identifier of the taxonomy to validate

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

check_semantic_consistency.description: Whether to perform semantic relationship checks

error_messages: Taxonomy not found: The specified taxonomy_id does not exist.
Empty taxonomy: Cannot validate taxonomy with no labels.
usage: Provide taxonomy_id for validation. Optionally set validation_level and check_semantic_consistency. The tool returns detailed validation results with any issues found.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, warnings, or failed

issues_found.description: Total number of validation issues detected

issue_details.description: Detailed descriptions of each validation issue
